trans-unit.target: TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_SEQ_00<tab>Sisipu would send you to Thanalan to aid Tocktix once more.

TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_SEQ_01<tab>The merchant Tocktix has returned to the Fishermen's Guild once more, this time in search of a desert catfish, which is a key ingredient in one of his favorite dishes. Unaware how a fisher might pull anything from sand, Sisipu recommends that you seek out U'goromuli, a dunefishing acquaintance of Tocktix's and a resident of Forgotten Springs in southern Thanalan.

TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_SEQ_02<tab>Though she would never eat desert catfish herself, U'goromuli is more than happy to assist you. She advises you to seek out a fishing hole east of Byregot's Strike, near an Amalj'aa encampment, and use sand leeches to catch your quarry. Once acquired, deliver the fish to Tocktix outside the Fishermen's Guild.

TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_SEQ_03<tab>Tocktix is ecstatic to receive his prized gourmet catfish. He promptly informs you that he shall waste no time in taking it to the Bismarck, where he has reserved a table for one after closing.
※The next fisher quest will be available from Sisipu upon reaching level 40.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_TODO_00<tab>Speak with U'goromuli at Forgotten Springs.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_TODO_01<tab>Deliver a desert catfish to Tocktix.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_SISIPU_000_000<tab>Your goblin friendlyfriend was looking for you earlier. He was hoping you'd make his fishiest fantasies come true.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_SISIPU_000_001<tab>He recalled a dish that tickled his fancy some years ago, and now needs you to procure the necessary fish for him.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_SISIPU_000_002<tab>This desert catfish, as it is apparently called, is indigenous to─and this is the truly mind-boggling part─the desert, of all places.

TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_SISIPU_000_003<tab>Tocktix spoke of a trapper named U'goromuli who'd fished one out of Forgotten Springs in the southern reaches of Thanalan. If you want that catfish, you'd best go and speak with her.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_UGOROMULI_000_010<tab>Friend of Tocktix, you say? Sure, dunefished my fair share of desert catfish.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_UGOROMULI_000_011<tab>Never eat them, though, know that much. Only ever use them as sandworm bait.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_UGOROMULI_000_012<tab>Thought of eating desert catfish hadn't occurred to me until the goblin devoured it before my eyes. Still wouldn't touch them myself.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_UGOROMULI_000_013<tab>Different fish for different folk, as they say. No problem fishing them out, though. Can even tell you how it's done.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_UGOROMULI_000_014<tab>Just comes down to the right bait in the right place. Nothing to it, really.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_UGOROMULI_000_015<tab>Easy as dropping a line with some sand leeches at the fishing hole east of Byregot's Strike, near the Amalj'aa encampment.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_UGOROMULI_000_016<tab>Not the same as sea fishing here in the dunes, mind you. Real test of your reel out here.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_UGOROMULI_000_017<tab>Trick is to hold on when it flails. Only takes one to make a day's haul. Good hunting.
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_TOCKTIX_000_020<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Fishbringer find tastyfresh fishcat in sandylands for friendlyfriend Tocktix?
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_TOCKTIX_000_021<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh... Tocktix is thanksgiving to fishbringer for lipsmacking fishcat!
TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_TOCKTIX_000_022<tab>Fishcat nosestrings make for strengthful satchelstrands.

TEXT_CLSFSH351_01115_TOCKTIX_000_023<tab>Tocktix trades tongueflaps with Lyngsath for fancycooking of fishcat in Bismarck! Lyngsath only fancycooks after shoplock because of strengthful fishcat odor. Fishbringer makes Tocktix one happygobbie!
